The ghoul staggers back, howling at the night sky, and gnashing its teeth. Suddenly, brownish ichor spills from its eyes and the flesh begins to shrivel on its bones. It collapses in on itself, leaving only a mound of putrescent matter, atop of which rests its head, now lifeless, empty eye-sockets staring at the moon. You grab the head, and set off.
